test.name: sel000023
test.description: Testing string comparisons; LIKE, NOT LIKE, '%'.

resultfile.name: r/3.23/sel000023.result
resultfile.sql: SELECT "abc" LIKE "a%", "abc" NOT LIKE "%d%", "a%" LIKE "a\%","abc%" LIKE "a%\%","abcd" LIKE "a%b_%d", "a" LIKE "%%a","abcde" LIKE "a%_e","abc" LIKE "abc%"
